code: import React from"react";import PickMeals from"../Assets/pick-meals-image.png";import ChooseMeals from"../Assets/choose-image.png";import DeliveryMeals from"../Assets/delivery-image.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Work=function Work(){var workInfoData=[{image:PickMeals,title:"Code",text:"feature allows students to submit assignments effortlessly by providing a GitHub link and branch."},{image:ChooseMeals,title:"Submit",text:"empowers students to efficiently submit assignments while enabling iterative feedback from reviewers."},{image:DeliveryMeals,title:"Get Reviewed",text:"feature facilitates collaboration, transparency and enriching the educational experience."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-section-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-section-top",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"primary-subheading",children:"Work"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"primary-heading",children:"How It Works"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"primary-text",children:"Across a span of 14 assignments, students kickstart the process by submitting their work, subsequently allowing reviewers to access, evaluate, and contribute valuable feedback and collaborative comments to facilitate iterative enhancements."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"work-section-bottom",children:workInfoData.map(function(data){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"work-section-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"info-boxes-img-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:data.image,alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:data.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:data.text})]},data.title);})})]});};export default Work;
